mapper.select: SELECT p10_payment_record.*, lumpSum.courtPayment as courtPayment FROM p10_payment_record, ( SELECT sum(payment_amount) as courtPayment FROM p10_payment_record WHERE p10_payment_record.project_id = #{projectId} AND p10_payment_record.funds_type LIKE concat( '%', 200, '%' ) AND p10_payment_record.payment_type = 200 AND p10_payment_record.status != 2 ) lumpSum WHERE p10_payment_record.project_id = #{projectId} AND p10_payment_record.funds_type LIKE concat( '%', 200, '%' ) AND p10_payment_record.payment_type = 200

select p10_payment_record.*,p10_payment_record.subject_name as name, p10_subject.subject_id as subjectId from p10_payment_record left join p10_payment_record_subject_re on p10_payment_record_subject_re.payment_record_id=p10_payment_record.payment_record_id left join p10_subject on p10_subject.subject_id=p10_payment_record_subject_re.subject_id where p10_payment_record.del_flag = 0 and p10_payment_record.project_id=#{projectId} and p10_payment_record.funds_type like concat( '%', 200, '%' ) and p10_payment_record.payment_type = 200 and p10_payment_record.status = 0

SELECT sys_user.actual_name, sum( payment_amount ) repaymentAmount FROM p10_payment_record LEFT JOIN p10_project ON p10_payment_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id AND p10_project.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user ON p10_payment_record.create_by = sys_user.user_id AND sys_user.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_payment_record.del_flag = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT( p10_payment_record.payment_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m' )
AND p10_project.ins_id = #{insId}
AND p10_project.outles_id = #{outlesId}
AND sys_user.actual_name like concat('%', #{query.managerName}, '%')
AND p10_payment_record.payment_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND p10_payment_record.father_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p10_payment_record.create_by ORDER BY repaymentAmount DESC
